content:
That's awesome to hear that you're still feeling energized from the charity fitness event! Congratulations on participating and making a difference!

Now, let's get you pumped up with some high-energy tracks to fuel your next workout! Here are some suggestions for your playlist:

**Upbeat Pop/Rock Anthems**

1. Eminem - "Lose Yourself"
2. Macklemore & Ryan Lewis - "Can't Hold Us"
3. The Black Eyed Peas - "I Gotta Feeling"
4. Katy Perry - "Roar"
5. Imagine Dragons - "Radioactive"

**Electronic Dance Beats**

1. Tiesto - "Red Lights"
2. Calvin Harris - "Summer"
3. David Guetta - "Titanium" (feat. Sia)
4. The Chainsmokers - "Closer" (feat. Halsey)
5. Major Lazer - "Lean On" (feat. DJ Snake & MØ)

**Hip-Hop/Rap Frenzy**

1. Cardi B - "Bodak Yellow"
2. Travis Scott - "Sicko Mode"
3. Nicki Minaj - "Chun-Li"
4. Post Malone - "Psycho" (feat. Ty Dolla Sign)
5. Lil Uzi Vert - "XO Tour Llama"

**Classic Rock Boost**

1. Queen - "We Will Rock You"
2. Guns N' Roses - "Sweet Child O' Mine"
3. AC/DC - "Thunderstruck"
4. Bon Jovi - "Livin' on a Prayer"
5. Foo Fighters - "The Pretender"

**Modern Pop-Punk Revival**

1. Panic! At The Disco - "High Hopes"
2. Fall Out Boy - "Uma Thurman"
3. Green Day - "American Idiot"
4. The All-American Rejects - "Gives You Hell"
5. Good Charlotte - "Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous"

Feel free to mix and match these tracks to create the ultimate playlist that gets you pumped up and moving during your workout!
